roleset.name: come up with ideas

example.name: arg1
example.text: There was never anything about a plan, just brainstorming ways to be more flamboyant.
example.note: For some reason this tree does not use a null subject.

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in BOLT-P01-3; nominal 'brainstorming' based on BOLT-7. Framed by Claire.

example.name: nominal rel: brainstorming
example.text: As an aid for his brainstorming about causes and effects, Kurt created the following Cause-. Effect Map on forgetting to put out the trash on time.
